text: MitiusGorochov AV (1985) Entomologicheskoe Obozrenie 64(1): 95. is a genus of crickets in the family Gryllidae and tribe Modicogryllini. Species can be found in Asia.Orthoptera Species File (Version 5.0/5.0: retrieved 29 August 2019) == Species == Mitius includes the following species: *Mitius blennus (Saussure, 1877) *Mitius castaneus (Chopard, 1937) *Mitius enatus Gorochov, 1994 *Mitius flavipes (Chopard, 1928) \- type species (as Gryllus flavipes Chopard) *Mitius minor (Shiraki, 1911) *Mitius minutulus Yang & Yang, 1995 *Mitius splendens (Shiraki, 1930) == References == == External links== * Category:Ensifera genera Category:Gryllinae Category:Orthoptera of Asia
title: Mitius
